citations.narrative:
The official USDA identification (tag, tattoo, or microchip) number was not recorded for puppies and adult dogs on APHIS
forms 7005 and 7006. Dogs and puppies are currently being identified by name on the APHIS forms. Without an official
USDA identification number, it is difficult to keep track of litters, dogs and puppies on premises, and animals sold. An
official USDA identification number needs to be recorded for puppies and dogs on APHIS forms 7005 and 7006 to help
keep track of animals. Correct by June 22, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(vi) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The official USDA identification (tag, tattoo, or microchip) number was not recorded for puppies and adult dogs on APHIS 
forms 7005 and 7006. Dogs and puppies are currently being identified by name on the APHIS forms. Without an official 
USDA identification number, it is difficult to keep track of litters, dogs and puppies on premises, and animals sold. An 
official USDA identification number needs to be recorded for puppies and dogs on APHIS forms 7005 and 7006 to help 
keep track of animals. Correct by June 22, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
